org.jclouds.abiquo.features.services
Interface MonitoringService

All Known Subinterfaces:
AsyncTaskMonitor, ConversionMonitor, VirtualApplianceMonitor, VirtualMachineMonitor
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseAsyncTaskMonitor, BaseConversionMonitor, BaseMonitoringService, BaseVirtualApplianceMonitor, BaseVirtualMachineMonitor
public interface MonitoringService

Utility service to monitor asynchronous operations.

Author:
Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat

Method Detail

awaitCompletion

<T> void awaitCompletion(com.google.common.base.Function<T,MonitorStatus> completeCondition,
                         T... objects)
Monitor the given objects using the given complete condition.

Parameters:
completeCondition - The function that will be used to decide if the asynchronous operations have finished.
objects - The objects to monitor.

awaitCompletion

<T> void awaitCompletion(Long maxWait,
                         TimeUnit timeUnit,
                         com.google.common.base.Function<T,MonitorStatus> completeCondition,
                         T... objects)
Monitor the given objects using the given complete condition.

Parameters:
maxWait - The maximum time to wait.
timeUnit - The time unit for the maxWait parameter.
completeCondition - The function that will be used to decide if the asynchronous operations have finished.
objects - The objects to monitor.
